scripts.test:browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:local: npm run clean && docker compose up -d && playwright test --config=playwright.local.config.js; npm run report && npm run report:publish; docker compose down
scripts.test:local:debug: npm run clean && docker compose up -d && playwright test --config=playwright.local.config.js --debug
scripts.test:local:browserstack: npm run clean && docker compose up -d && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.browserstack.config.js --browserstack.config=browserstack.local.yml; npm run report && npm run report:publish; docker compose down
